metaData.label: WH
metaData.criteriaDescription: mainSpecialty equal OBG OR mainSpecialty equal GYN

metaData.label: SURG
metaData.criteriaDescription: mainSpecialty equal GS OR mainSpecialty equal RHU OR mainSpecialty equal T OR mainSpecialty equal IM OR mainSpecialty equal NS OR mainSpecialty equal FMG OR mainSpecialty equal N

metaData.label: ONCO
metaData.criteriaDescription: mainSpecialty equal ONG OR mainSpecialty equal ON OR mainSpecialty equal SO OR mainSpecialty equal U OR mainSpecialty equal RO OR mainSpecialty equal URO OR mainSpecialty equal HMP OR mainSpecialty equal ATP
